posts.post_content: Nice Image...Thanks for the help on the main forum. Free shipping. on ebay

[quote name="Jim VB" post=739863]He actually took the time to post an image on the main board when he needed help to find out who this was. But when he goes to sell it here, posting an image is too much trouble. 

Guess he can't claim he doesn't know how to post images anymore.[/QUOTE]

Trouble. Maker.
